Step 7: Play Core Activities

What are core activities?
These are playlists that you will do regularly to progress in the game and earn better gear.
There are three of these activities. Strikes have you fighting through hoardes of enemies with two friends to get to a boss fight. Gambit has you and three friends competing with other players to kill the most amount of enemies and a boss within a limited time. Lastly, Crucible pits you and up to seven friends against other players in team deathmatches and other PVP (Player Versus Player) content. Click the button repeatedly to grind out these core activities and move on!
